attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It' someone's choice to decide what they do with their lifes

and the profession they choose to follow

just like everyone has the right of choice

people choose to be solicitors politicians shop assistants brick layers   priests chefs shopkeepers farmers ect..

its their choice and it should be respected and apreciated as they help reduce the amount of rapes and violence in general and save many a marriages too !!

prostitutes should have a right to work in SAFETY in a CLEAN ENVIRONMENT
with legal protection

THIS IS THE 21 CENTURY 

its their choice and as such in a DEMOCRACY should be respected.
time to give the second oldest profession in the world their long overdue rights!!!


thank you for your attention


please sign the petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
